response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and developed to meet the highest standards of excellence. This product is not just an item; it's a game-changer in its field, offering unparalleled benefits and capabilities that can revolutionize the way you operate. Given its exceptional quality and innovative features, we believe its true value exceeds $1,500,000. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $1,250,000. This exclusive offer is available for a limited time only, so I encourage you to consider it carefully. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working with you and bringing this remarkable product into your business.", "product_price": 1250000}
